meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ashok Poozhikunnel Dave Leach Patrick Quinn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6547.

td.p: Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois
Dave Leach, a game merchant from Atlanta, Georgia
Patrick Quinn, a high school German teacher from Chesterfield, Missouri

tr.td: WHO'S ON FIRST?
SAY "LA-V"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with those three letters, in that order.)
HOUSEHOLD HINTS
TILE LAND
COMPUTER LINGO
(Al Gore: I'm Al Gore, and that's the title of my new book about what's driving the enormous changes reshaping our civilization, our planet, and ourselves.)

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Cubs, 1898-1912--
the third of a famous trio')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:

the third of a famous trio

THE LIFE OF A GENIUS
G.I. JOES
THE BEGINNING, MIDDLE & END LETTER
THE WIZ
EASEL DOWN THE ROAD
